name: Branko
greetingText: Love your name btw. It's the only name I know that has it's own bra. ;)
wishText: May you never have shortage of perfectly cooked beef and hikes with the most fulfilling views! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Fuck, this is cheesy. Let's pretend you never saw this.
replayText: Or meh, click if you want to watch it again.
